<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <entry>10494/78286</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>78286</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>eb48f774-9357-4881-880a-c20f275f5c56#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Sav-bázis pár levezetése a sósav példáján</string>
            <string language="en">The deduction of the acid-base pair following the example of hydrochloric acid</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Abzug des Säure-Unterseite Paares nach dem 
Beispiel der Salzsäure</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La déduction de la paire d'acide-base après 
l'exemple de l'acide chlorhydrique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A dedução do par da ácido-base depois do 
exemplo do ácido hydrochloric</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La deduzione dell'accoppiamento della acido-base 
dopo l'esempio di acido cloridrico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η αφαίρεση του ζευγαριού όξινος-βάσεων μετά από το 
παράδειγμα του υδροχλωρικού οξέος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La deducción del par de la a'cido-base después 
del ejemplo del ácido hidroclórico</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Sav-bázis párok lépésenkénti levezetése II.</string>
            <string language="en">The step-by-step deduction of the acid-base pairs II.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">sav, bázis, sav-bázis, sósav</string>
            <string language="en">acid, base, acid-base, hydrochloric acid</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der schrittweisee Abzug der Säure-Unterseite 
paßt II zusammen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La déduction pas à pas de l'acide-base 
appareille II.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A dedução passo a passo da ácido-base 
emparelha II.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La deduzione graduale della acido-base accoppia 
II.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η βαθμιαία αφαίρεση των ζευγαριών ΙΙ όξινος-βάσεων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La deducción paso a paso de la a'cido-base 
empareja II.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Säure, Unterseite, Säure-Unterseite, Salzsäure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">acide, base, acide-base, acide chlorhydrique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ácido, base, ácido-base, ácido hydrochloric</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">acido, base, acido-base, acido cloridrico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οξύ, βάση, όξινος-βάση, υδροχλωρικό οξύ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ácido, base, a'cido-base, ácido hidroclórico</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>simulation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>195</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>78286</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://sdt.sulinet.hu/Player/default.aspx?g=eb48f774-9357-4881-880a-c20f275f5c56&v=1&b=2</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
